headline: Ulta Beauty (ULTA): Exploring Valuation as Shares Cool After Early-Year Surge
summary: Ulta Beauty (ULTA) has recently caught the attention of investors as its stock moved on moderate trading volume. Given the company’s unique position in the beauty retail sector, some are re-examining its long-term growth story. See our latest analysis for Ulta Beauty. After surging earlier in the year, Ulta Beauty's share price has cooled a bit in recent weeks. However, momentum over a longer period remains strong; the 1-year total shareholder return stands at an impressive 34.40%,...
